RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 12800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JUNE 30. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS FUSSY PANTS was bumped at the start, stalked the pace three wide through the turn, rallied to make the lead at the top of the stretch then widened at will the balance of the trip to win as much the best while in handy. HOT CAROL drifted out leaving the chute, set a pressured pace to the top of the stretch then was no match for the winner. COWGIRL KIMMIE drifted out bumping CHORIST at the start, was allowed to settle, swung wide entering the stretch then finished determinedly in the seven path. SWEET BELEN also drifted out leaving the chute, prompted the pace two wide into the turn then weakened in the stretch. SABELLE was bumped at the start, in tight entering the main track, dropped inside rivals, had speed into the turn then tired. CHORIST was bumped at the start, taken outside soon thereafter and trailed. THE RIDER OF SABELLE LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF THE WINNER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE AT THE START. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS UPHELD THE ORIGINAL ORDER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Carol
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out leaving chute, set pace top lane, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Belen
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out leaving chute, pressed 2 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Cowgirl Kimmie
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, swung wide, determinedly 7path

ENTRY.NAME: Chorist
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, taken wide, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Sabelle
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, tight 11/16p, inside speed, tired, claimed foul

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Fussy Pants
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, stalked 3 wide, 3/16p lead, much the best, handily,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 10900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE DECEMBER 30. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROSY APPLE prompted the pace two wide into the turn, made the lead near the quarter pole, set the balance of the pace and finished full of run under mild urging to win going away. LA REINA DEL NORTE set a pressured pace inside the winner to the quarter pole then kept on along the rail and finished second best. FLYING BUSINESS drifted in bumping WOLF EYES at the start, veered inward nearing the turn, saved ground through the bend, shifted out to the three path entering the stretch and finished evenly. WOLF EYES was bumped and pinched back at the start then failed to reach contention. BIRDIE BLUE was no factor. LUCKY ROAD failed to menace. DE PURA SANGRE stalked the early pace three wide and weakened on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Birdie Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: La Reina Del Norte
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Rosy Apple
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, perfect trip, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Wolf Eyes
ENTRY.COMMENT: pinched back start, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Flying Business
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, veered in 7/16pole, saved ground bend, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: De Pura Sangre
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, weakened turn,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 86. Starter Allowance Purse 17600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 30 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 O r Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIVINE FASHION always within striking distance while hung five wide down the backstretch, closed willingly four wide through the turn, made the lead under right handed urging entering the stretch then drew off readily through the final furlong to win as much the best while in hand. KHOZZY VALINTINE had speed from the start, offered a mild bid along the rail into the stretch and finished well clear for second. DIVINE MARTHA stalked the pace four then three wide into the stretch and was outfinished. MISS OVER THERE failed to menace. FOR THE BISCUIT set a pressured pace along the inside for a half then weakened. HIGH SPEED pressed the pace two wide into the turn and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: For the Biscuit
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: High Speed
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Khozzy Valintine
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move inside, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Over There
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Divine Martha
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 4-3wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Divine Fashion
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5 wide backstretch, rallied 4 wide turn, much the best, handily,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 17600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.

CLAIM.OWNER: Burnsworth Richard and Ultra Championship Racing LLC

RACE.FOOTNOTES: EARLY BLOOMER allowed to settle, closed with a burst of speed six wide through the stretch under strong handling and got up in the final strides. ANGEL WINGS vied for the lead along the inside into the turn, split horses two wide entering the stretch, made the lead, shook clear late then couldn't handle the late charge of the winner. LADY FORTUNE never far back, began to rally along the inside into the stretch, lacked racing room, shifted out four wide nearing the furlong marker, dropped back in two wide nearing the sixteenth pole and finished with good courage. MERE BAG OF SHELLS pressed the pace two wide into the turn, gained a narrow advantage before a half, battled until deep stretch then came up empty. FABULOUS CLOWN failed to menace. SORORITY SISTER stalked the pace three then four wide into the stretch and faded late. WHERETHERE'SSMOKE well placed, failed to respond. PRICELESS PICTURE was no threat. OUT FOR FUN was no factor. MISS ELLIE sped to a clear lead soon after the start, set the pace along the inside for nearly a half, remained a sharp threat until deep stretch then weakened. LEDGENDARY KITTEN was always outrun. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN BUT TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Ledgendary Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Priceless Picture
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Ellie
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Angel Wings
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, split horses top lane, shook clear, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Early Bloomer
ENTRY.OWNER: JK Stable LLC and Barker Scott W
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, closed fast, 6 wide, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Fortune
ENTRY.COMMENT: closed inside top lane, shifted 4w, no room, angled in 2wide late

ENTRY.NAME: Fabulous Clown
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Wherethere'ssmoke
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Out for Fun
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Mere Bag of Shells
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2 wide, led 3 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Sorority Sister
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3-4wide, faded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JUNE 30. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In We ight Allowances) (Winners since June 30 Preferred)(Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MONTAUK COVE vied for lead the lead along the inside, dug in to engage the leader at the top of the stretch, battled to the wire and proved best in a game effort under strong handling. QUICK ENTRY made the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace until deep stretch, dug in determinedly and gained second. NICHOLAS JAMES allowed to settle, split horses two wide in deep stretch, was steadily gaining ground, clipped heels past the wire, fell and was vanned off. ROCK ON KITTEN well placed outside, closed a gap late five wide. AMIGO'S AFFAIR stalked the pace outside down the backstretch, loomed boldly three wide midway on the turn, matched strides four wide until the final stages and was outfinished. NEWS BOX found his best stride late. UNIDENTIFIED MAN settled inside and went evenly. HARD N'SWEET was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Hard n'Sweet
ENTRY.OWNER: Vickers Richard T and Pena Yendri J
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: News Box
ENTRY.COMMENT: best stride late,

ENTRY.NAME: Unidentified Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Nicholas James
ENTRY.COMMENT: best stride late 2 wide, fell past wire, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Montauk Cove
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, long drive, proved best

ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace, just failed,

ENTRY.COMMENT: good position, closed gap late 5 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NEPOTISM stalked the early pace four wide, took command three wide entering the far turn, set the balance of the pace and drew off under mild left handed urging to win as much the best while taken in hand late. SWELTER bore out at the start, settled mid pack, rallied five wide through the stretch and got up for second. ALEXIS N NIKO set the pace along the inside through the clubhouse turn, kept pressure into the stretch and finished with good courage. FIVE STAR PHIL allowed to settle, offered a mild bid three then two wide into the stretch then leveled off. STRASBOURG well placed, rallied four wide through the far turn then came up empty. BOSS BEAR was no factor. OCTOBER FROST was no threat. RIKIO pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then gave way. KING SOCIAL was carried out at the start and always outrun. LONG RAP SHEET failed to menace. MASTER pressed the pace three wide around the first bend, made the lead, set the pace to the seven sixteenths pole then was used up.

ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace inside, kept on, good effort

ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 71. Allowance Purse 35100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 30 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allow ances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWING STATE stalked the pace three wide for a half, made the lead, set the balance of the pace and widened through the stretch under vigorous handling to win as much the best. ORFANO delayed the start wile refusing to load, was unhurried for a half, rallied steadily three wide on the far turn and into the stretch and finished clear for second. WATCHOUTFORWEAVER set the early pace along the inside, remained a sharp threat through the far turn and weakened in the stretch. LITTLE RONS ROCKET failed to menace. CLEVELAND POWER saved ground, offered a mild bid into the stretch then came up empty. SMOOCHER was outrun. ANIMO ROBERTO pressed the early pace two wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.OWNER: Burnsworth Richard and Ultra Championship Racing LLC

ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, improved into lane, empty,

ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3w, took over past 1/2 pole, much the best, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 30 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIVOLI never far back, rallied three wide through the turn to make the lead at the top of the stretch and finished full of run under brisk handling to win going away. GOODBYELLOWBRICKRD stalked the early pace three wide, loomed boldly two wide nearing the quarter pole then was no match for the winner and finished second best. RED GUN never far back, offered a mild bid into the stretch, drifted out through the late stages and was outfinished. GOLD HERITAGE vied for the lead along the inside and went evenly. HALLOWEEN sprinted to the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace to the top of the stretch then weakened. FALK was no factor. HAPPY HOUR BOBBY was through early.

ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 48. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUNAWAY HAPPY away alertly, set all the pace unchallenged and widened through the stretch at will to win easily. STICK AROUND allowed to settle, had a mild late rally inside rivals and got up for second. MISS SPRINGSTEEN chased the winner and was outfinished for second in an even effort. BOUNCE PASS had good early speed along the inside and faded in the stretch. MINESTRESS veered in at the start, drifted out leaving the chute to race wide and was no threat. SHAMANS IMAGE was no factor. POINTOF ATTRACTION stalked pace the early pace four wide and gave way in the stretch. LATE BLOOMBOPPER was always outrun.

ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, faded lane

ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,
